title: How to Make an Apple and Banana Milkshake

steps.title: Get an apple.
steps.content: Get an apple. Peel, chop, and core the apple.

steps.title: Get a banana.
steps.content: Get a banana. Peel and chop the banana.

steps.title: Get a blender.
steps.content: Get a blender. Put the apples and bananas into the blender but don't start the blender yet.

steps.title: Pour in 1/3 of milk in the blender.
steps.content: Pour in 1/3 of milk in the blender. Don't start it just yet.

steps.title: Add up to 2 teaspoons of sugar.
steps.content: Add up to 2 teaspoons of sugar. Put these into the blender and start the blender.

steps.title: Set the blender to whip.
steps.content: Set the blender to whip. Blend for 1 minute.

steps.title: Crush the ice for a minute in the blender.
steps.content: Crush the ice for a minute in the blender.

steps.title: Divide the milkshake in two.
steps.content: Divide the milkshake in two. Pour into glasses. Serve and enjoy.

steps.title: Peel the apple and banana.
steps.content: Peel the apple and banana. Chop both into small pieces.

steps.title: Chop the almonds and dates into small pieces.
steps.content: Chop the almonds and dates into small pieces.

steps.title: Add the chopped ingredients to a blender or food processor.
steps.content: Add the chopped ingredients to a blender or food processor. Blend them together for one minute to create a smooth paste.

steps.title: Pour the milk in with the puree.
steps.content: Pour the milk in with the puree. Blend or puree for another minute.

steps.title: Pour into two glasses.
steps.content: Pour into two glasses. Serve immediately.
